phrases.original: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default your message will only contain the name of the event and a link for the recipient to click on. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default your message will only contain the name of the event and a link for the recipient to click on. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.

phrases.original: Hi, it's {NAME}. It was nice talking with you. I hope you can join us.
phrases.translated: Hi, it's {NAME}. It was nice talking with you. I hope you can join us.

phrases.original: You can be immediately notified if someone you invited views or interacts with their invite. This allows you to follow up with them in a timely manner.
phrases.translated: You can be immediately notified if someone you invited views or interacts with their invite. This allows you to follow up with them in a timely manner.

phrases.original: Note: the above notification settings apply to every single invite you have sent. A more precise alternative is to enable notifications for all invites, but unsubscribe from notifications about a specific invite. The link to unsubscribe from notifications for a specific invite is found through the My Invites page.
phrases.translated: Note: the above notification settings apply to every single invite you have sent. A more precise alternative is to enable notifications for all invites, but unsubscribe from notifications about a specific invite. The link to unsubscribe from notifications for a specific invite is found through the My Invites page.

phrases.original: When you send an invite, you can automatically add the recipient to your Follow Up List. This setting only applies to future invites, and not retroactively.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite, you can automatically add the recipient to your Follow Up List. This setting only applies to future invites, and not retroactively.

phrases.original: Automatically add invite recipients to my Follow Up List
phrases.translated: Automatically add invite recipients to my Follow Up List

phrases.original: As a registered user, you not only have the ability to invite people to specific events, but also to let them see your public profile. Your public profile is a Web page that is specific and unique to you. It has its own Web page address (below), which you can promote for evangelistic purposes in multiple ways:
phrases.translated: As a registered user, you not only have the ability to invite people to specific events, but also to let them see your public profile. Your public profile is a Web page that is specific and unique to you. It has its own Web page address (below), which you can promote for evangelistic purposes in multiple ways:

phrases.original: Your public profile Web page is a potential way to passively invite people to a wider variety of events, because the events that you can invite people to are listed on your public profile. By promoting the link to your public profile in various ways, you can evangelize more effectively.
phrases.translated: Your public profile Web page is a potential way to passively invite people to a wider variety of events, because the events that you can invite people to are listed on your public profile. By promoting the link to your public profile in various ways, you can evangelize more effectively.

phrases.original: Here's the Web page address to your public profile:
phrases.translated: Here's the Web page address to your public profile:
